titles.title: A resolution expressing solidarity with the Cuban people in demanding freedom and human rights, and commending their courage in the wake of the July 11, 2021, protests.
A resolution expressing solidarity with the Cuban people in demanding freedom and human rights, and commending their courage in the wake of the July 11, 2021, protests.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and expresses support for the efforts of democracy and human rights activists in Cuba.
